title: NOKIA 165 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD 4K LED Smart Android TV with Sound by Onkyo and Dolby Atmos  (65UHDADNDT8P)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Television Set, Remote Control, User Manual, Mini AV Cable, 2 AAA Batteries, 2 TV Stand, 4 Stand Support Screws, Wallmount Stand, 4 Wallmount Stand Screws, Power Cord
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPG, AVI, TS, MOV, MKV, DAT, MP4, VOB
product_specification.Sound Technology: Sound by Onkyo, Dolby Atmos, 48 W Sound Power, Onkyo Surround Sound
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Netflix, Prime, Disney+hotstar, Zee5, Voot, Spotify, SonyLiv, YouTube, Google Suite of Apps and Others Downloadable from Playstore etc.
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Latest Android 11, Google Assistant, Chromecast Built-in, Google Home, Compatible with Gamepad
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant with Netflix, Prime Video and YouTube Hotkeys, Minimalistic Design
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship. Parts and Labour Costs are Covered
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag, plastic parts), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups, Panel damages caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Sound by Onkyo: Elevate the joy of listening by experiencing it with all your senses. Indulge yourself to inspire moments of transcendent feelings. Experience best of the best with technologically advanced sound architect-designed and curated by Onkyo. Through Dynamic amplification technology, it captures the energy and dynamism contained in an audio signal, reproducing it without any quality loss. Experience crystal clear sound characteristics with zero feedback and minimal distortions along with >150% more sound clarity.
product_description.Powered by Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos: Dolby Vision HDR transforms your TV experience with ultra-vivid picture that brings entertainment to life. Dolby Atmos creates powerful, moving audio that seems to flow all around you.

review:
HD and 4K videos are displayed excellent and good surround sound. Comes with Android 11 and Google assistant works well.

On-time delivery and Installation and demo by Flipkart team.

Highly recommend other to purchase Nokia TV who are providing excellent hardware specs with latest software.

Truly a real good tv after 10 days of usage. Sound quality nd picture quality are top notch. Much better experience compared to MI 5X, the nokia sound by onkyo version is real good (well you do have to configure the sound profile). Best thing you can change the audio settings while you are watch something and it won't go to settings page rather it will let you change settings in the overlay itself. Only samsung has such seamlessness other than nokia. Glad i purchased this. Watching through browser on websites is easy too.

The only con is that Rakuten Viki app doesn't support Nokia TV (if you are into korean series and movies you will know).

Picture quality is good and clear,
Sound quality is good and bass is good, overall experience is good
Worth buying value for money 💲.

Its a a great tv at this price range..i will say it is just perfect..am completely satisfied with the performance in all aspects..fully recommended..u won't be disappointed..thank you nokia for this amazing product..and the installation was also stress free and quick..go for it
This Nokia TV is more than our expectation and I m so happy with this 65inch Nokia Android TV.Thank you so much Flipkart for super products with awesome price!!!

Sound quality: totally impressed, the bass it produces when Dolby Atmos is ON, it's awesome. No negetive

Pros
4K
Great Audio. I personally don't feel need to purchase any extra soundbar.
Screen is really crisp and saturated.
Remote has many useful shortcuts
Android TV OS, so latest features from Google

Cons
Slow. One thing I noticed with budget TVs are that they use very cheap and entry level processors, which make the UX very slow. And this is something one has to live with. Sometimes apps will take ages to load. I don't use DTH, I mostly use multiple OTTs. So whenever I wanted to go watch TV, I first log into Netflix or Prime Video in my PC, browse what I would like to see, and then head over to the TV.
